detail_desc: Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with wide, taped reinforcements under the bust for extra support. Racer back and concealed elastication at the hem. Extra firm support.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Cropped top in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, opening with ties at the back and long trumpet sleeves.

Tunic in woven fabric with a V-neck trimmed with faceted sparkly stones, and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Jacket in lightweight, patterned, stretch cotton twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Dress in an airy cotton weave with inset lace trims, a V-neck opening at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Flutter sleeves and flounces down the front that continue back over the shoulders. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with lace trims and sewn-in, decorative pleats around the hem. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in a jacquard weave with a high waist with a hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a fake welt pocket at the back and straight, wide legs with creases.
Jackets in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Treggings in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly with a decorative button and front and back pockets.
Fitted, calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a draped, sewn-in wrapover front and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Calf-length dress in woven fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a small V-neck. Buttons down the front, smocking at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Short, high-waisted jersey shorts in a cotton and modal blend with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Shorts woven in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, two fake back pockets and short slits in the hems.
Fitted short-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Set with a metal necklace and stud earrings. Thin metal chain necklace with a pendant. Adjustable length, 41-48 cm. Small studs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.

Calf-length dress in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed button and frills down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Short, wide puff sleeves with covered elastication at the hems, a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Recycled polyester lining.
Treggings in soft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Striped cotton jersey top with a ribbed trim around the neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and short slits in the sides.

Non-wired bras in jersey and lace with lightly padded, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Double-layered jersey hats in a soft cotton blend. One with a print motif and one in a solid colour.

Backpack in nylon with a handle at the top and a roll-top opening with an adjustable tab and plastic fastener. Adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a padded mesh back plate. Lined. Size 13x28x57 cm (when open).
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 1.8 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with fringes. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Sleeveless top in a fine, sturdy knit with a slight sheen. Narrow shoulder straps with D-rings and a seam at the hem with textured-knit sections.
Ankle-length jeans in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs with contrasting colour side stripes.
Longer shirt in lightweight, checked viscose flannel with a collar and buttons down the front. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sleeveless dress in an airy weave with decorative, textured stripes, buttons at the back, a seam at the waist with sewn-on fabric flowers and a gathered skirt. Lined.
Short, straight-cut jacket in a textured weave containing glittery threads. Small stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and frayed cuffs. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif. Round neckline, short sleeves, and rounded and longer at the back.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Trainers in canvas with lacing at the front and a lightly padded edge and tongue. Canvas linings and insoles.
Short top in an airy cotton weave. Square neckline with a narrow elastication, short, elasticated puff sleeves and elasticated hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with worn details. Side pockets, back pockets and decorative seams on the legs.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative drawstring, fake fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Short dress in woven fabric with a print motif on the front, a small opening with a button at the back, and short sleeves.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

prod_name: Mini Me LOGG Bixa dress LOGG
detail_desc: Wide dress in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline and long, slightly wider sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips for added volume at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Cap with a motif on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a turtle neck and short sleeves.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Narrow, decorative piping down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fabric cap with elastication at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, decorative plastic rings at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh shoulder straps and a narrow racer back with elastic straps.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit. Slightly looser fit with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and dropped shoulders. Ribbing around the neckline, down the front and at the cuffs and hem.
Short nightdress in soft jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a pompom on the top.

Softshell jacket in water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elastic drawstring and small peak, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket with a zip and earphone outlet on the inside, zipped side pockets, elastication at the cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Thermal fleece inside. Size of chest pocket approx. 12x17 cm.
Spotted socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a foldover shaft with an overlocked, frill-trimmed top.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Trainer socks in a soft ribbed cotton blend with lace-trimmed tops.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbed neckline.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.

Two pouch bags and a card holder on a metal ring. The metal ring can be opened, making it easy to add or remove accessories of your choice. One pouch bag in imitation leather and one in imitation suede, both with a zip at the top. Card holder in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with two card slots. Diameter of ring 10 cm. Size of card holder 7x10 cm. Size of pouches 9.5x13 cm and 12x16.5 cm.

Parka in a woven modal blend with an unlined hood, loose yoke, zip down the front and drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, elasticated cuffs, a drawstring at the hem and a single back vent. Unlined.

Short, V-neck dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Short sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Concealed zip at the back and hemstitched trims around the neckline, waist, sleeves and hem. Lined skirt.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton jersey with a collar and button placket.
Short-sleeved jersey top.
